hello:
Hello.
I'll help you share songs you listened on Spotify recently.

Please link your Spotify account.
linked:
Your account is linked, go share some tracks.

Use /logout to unlink the account.
linked_whitelist:
Your account is linked, go share some tracks.

The user must be whitelisted by the developer.

Use /logout to unlink the account.
logout:
Goodbye.

Please link your Spotify account.
